Package org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class ORECodec

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.LogicCodec<ORExpression,​EditableORE>
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.ORECodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class ORECodec
extends LogicCodec<ORExpression,​EditableORE>
This class provides a codec for ω-regular expressions. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
